trans-unit.source: What's New in Azure Data Catalog
trans-unit.target: What's New in Azure Data Catalog

trans-unit.source: Overview of new capabilities in the Azure Data Catalog preview.
trans-unit.target: Overview of new capabilities in the Azure Data Catalog preview.

trans-unit.source: What's new in Azure Data Catalog
trans-unit.target: What's new in Azure Data Catalog

trans-unit.source: Updates to **Azure Data Catalog** are released on a regular basis.
trans-unit.target: Updates to **Azure Data Catalog** are released on a regular basis.

trans-unit.source: Not every release will include new user-facing features, as some releases are focused on back-end service capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Not every release will include new user-facing features, as some releases are focused on back-end service capabilities.

trans-unit.source: This page will highlight new user-facing capabilities added to the **Azure Data Catalog** service.
trans-unit.target: This page will highlight new user-facing capabilities added to the **Azure Data Catalog** service.

trans-unit.source: What's new for the week of August 28, 2015 release
trans-unit.target: What's new for the week of August 28, 2015 release

trans-unit.source: As of the week of August 28, 2015, the following capabilities have been added to **Azure Data Catalog**:
trans-unit.target: As of the week of August 28, 2015, the following capabilities have been added to **Azure Data Catalog**:

trans-unit.source: Support for data profiling of SQL Server and Oracle data sources.
trans-unit.target: Support for data profiling of SQL Server and Oracle data sources.

trans-unit.source: When registering SQL Server and Oracle tables and views, users can choose to include data profile information for the objects being registered.
trans-unit.target: When registering SQL Server and Oracle tables and views, users can choose to include data profile information for the objects being registered.

trans-unit.source: The data profile includes object-level and column-level statistics.
trans-unit.target: The data profile includes object-level and column-level statistics.

trans-unit.source: Support for Hadoop HDFS data sources.
trans-unit.target: Support for Hadoop HDFS data sources.

trans-unit.source: Users can now register and discover HDFS files and directories.
trans-unit.target: Users can now register and discover HDFS files and directories.

trans-unit.source: What's new for the week of August 21, 2015 release
trans-unit.target: What's new for the week of August 21, 2015 release

trans-unit.source: As of the week of August 21, 2015, the following capabilities have been added to **Azure Data Catalog**:
trans-unit.target: As of the week of August 21, 2015, the following capabilities have been added to **Azure Data Catalog**:

trans-unit.source: Support for providing access request information for registered data sources.
trans-unit.target: Support for providing access request information for registered data sources.

trans-unit.source: For any registered data asset, users can now provide instructions for requesting access, including email links or URLs, to easily integrate with existing tools and processes.
trans-unit.target: For any registered data asset, users can now provide instructions for requesting access, including email links or URLs, to easily integrate with existing tools and processes.

trans-unit.source: Tool tips for tags and experts, to make it easier to discover what users have provided what metadata for registered data assets.
trans-unit.target: Tool tips for tags and experts, to make it easier to discover what users have provided what metadata for registered data assets.

trans-unit.source: We’ve added a new “User” button and menu to our top navigation bar.
trans-unit.target: We’ve added a new “User” button and menu to our top navigation bar.

trans-unit.source: This menu lets the user see the account used to log on to **Azure Data Catalog**, and to sign out if desired.
trans-unit.target: This menu lets the user see the account used to log on to **Azure Data Catalog**, and to sign out if desired.

trans-unit.source: This menu also displays the catalog name, which is valuable to developers using the **Azure Data Catalog** REST API.
trans-unit.target: This menu also displays the catalog name, which is valuable to developers using the **Azure Data Catalog** REST API.

trans-unit.source: Standard Edition Only: When adding owners to data assets, **Azure Data Catalog** now supports both user accounts and security groups as owners.
trans-unit.target: Standard Edition Only: When adding owners to data assets, **Azure Data Catalog** now supports both user accounts and security groups as owners.

trans-unit.source: To add a security group as an owner for selected data assets, you can enter either the group’s display name or the group’s UPN email address, if it has one.
trans-unit.target: To add a security group as an owner for selected data assets, you can enter either the group’s display name or the group’s UPN email address, if it has one.

trans-unit.source: Support for Azure Blob Storage data sources.
trans-unit.target: Support for Azure Blob Storage data sources.

trans-unit.source: Users can now register and discover Azure Storage blobs and directories.
trans-unit.target: Users can now register and discover Azure Storage blobs and directories.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
